About this app

This is a modified version of rtl_tcp_android that enables the RTL-SDR Blog V4 to function. Change the -T 0 flag to -T 1 to enable the bias tee.

This application is a port of rtl_tcp to the android platform. It allows other applications to start rtl_tcp and use the raw I/Q samples that it reads from USB DVB-T dongles based on the RTL2832U chip and Hack RF

It also allows Android to stream over the network directly from the UI of the driver. This is an advanced feature and there could be bugs.

Notes and license

The app currently is experimental and could be unstable. Please, share your experience by sending me an email.

This app is open source and is licensed under GPL2+. The source code could be found on github.com/signalwareltd/rtl_tcp_andro-
